projects.name: Data Pipeline Optimization
projects.description: Project focused on optimizing data ingestion and transformation pipelines for faster data processing.

tasks.summary: Set up initial data pipeline architecture
tasks.description: Design and implement the architecture for the data pipeline, ensuring scalability and fault tolerance.
Add validation logic to ensure the integrity of incoming data, including schema validation and duplicate checks.
Refactor the batch processing component to minimize latency and improve throughput, ensuring quicker turnaround for large datasets.

projects.name: ETL Process Revamp
projects.description: This project aims to redesign the ETL process for better data quality and to reduce processing times.

tasks.summary: Migrate ETL jobs to cloud infrastructure
tasks.description: Move existing ETL workflows from on-premise servers to a cloud-based platform like AWS Glue or Azure Data Factory.

tasks.summary: Create error-handling mechanism for ETL jobs
tasks.description: Implement a robust error-handling system for ETL jobs, with alerts and automatic retries in case of failure.

tasks.summary: Develop transformation logic for sales data
tasks.description: Write transformation logic to clean, aggregate, and format raw sales data for further analysis.

projects.name: Dashboard Query Optimization
projects.description: Improve the performance of queries that generate dashboards, ensuring they run efficiently even with large datasets.

tasks.summary: Analyze slow queries and identify bottlenecks
tasks.description: Investigate the current SQL queries used for generating dashboards to identify performance bottlenecks.
Optimize SQL queries by refactoring them to use indexes, proper joins, and query parallelism where needed.

tasks.summary: Set up caching for dashboard queries
tasks.description: Implement a caching layer to store the results of common queries, reducing load on the database.
